ygData.subject: Re: question about guild and research
ygData.msgSnippet: ya, you can get to the smugglers (thieves guild) from under the docks, and they connect via the tunnels to the dismal rage (necro/sk guild), and outside to the
ygData.messageBody:
ya, you can get to the smugglers (thieves guild) from under the docks, and
they connect via the tunnels to the dismal rage (necro/sk guild), and
outside to the secret passage to freeport. be careful, the tunnels also
connect to n freeport, the haven of those vile paladins, aka kos city.

belphenor.

>From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>Date: Wed, 9 Jun 1999 10:45:33 -0400
>
>I found the guild in Freeport, but I read somewhere that somewhere under
>the docks is an entrance, can anyone confirm this?
>
>Also, where can I buy books to tell me recipes for making spells? Can I
>buy them from my guild in Necro guild in freeport?
>
